docs.snippet: Microsoft Corp's hardware chief gave employees a sneak peek at a 'selfie' phone featuring a 5 megapixel forward-facing camera at an internal meeting this week, a source at the company said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Microsoft Gives Employees Sneak Peek at New 'Selfie' Phone
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Gives Employees Sneak Peek at New 'Selfie' Phone

docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft Corp's hardware chief gave employees a sneak peek at a 'selfie' phone featuring a 5 megapixel forward-facing camera at an internal meeting this week, a source at the company said on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: A New Jersey man who said he was high on drugs and hearing voices when he fatally beat an elderly man with a sauce pan has been convicted of murder....

headline.main: Man Convicted of Murder in Fatal Sauce Pan Beating
headline.print_headline: Man Convicted of Murder in Fatal Sauce Pan Beating

docs.lead_paragraph: A New Jersey man who said he was high on drugs and hearing voices when he fatally beat an elderly man with a sauce pan has been convicted of murder.

docs.snippet: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry dismisses criticism regarding his efforts to achieve a cease-fire in the ongoing Mideast conflict. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....

headline.main: Kerry: 'I've taken hits before in politics'
headline.sub: Kerry: 'I've taken hits before in politics'

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry dismisses criticism regarding his efforts to achieve a cease-fire in the ongoing Mideast conflict. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

docs.snippet: An expert says the shotgun used to kill a young woman on a porch in suburban Detroit wasn't accidentally fired by the homeowner....

headline.main: Expert: No Accident With Gun in Porch Shooting
headline.print_headline: Expert: No Accident With Gun in Porch Shooting

docs.lead_paragraph: An expert says the shotgun used to kill a young woman on a porch in suburban Detroit wasn't accidentally fired by the homeowner.

docs.snippet: Italy's Finmeccanica said on Tuesday it had reached a agreement with prosecutors to settle legal proceedings over a high profile helicopter contract between one of its units and India, adding this did not equal an acknowledgment of any wrongdoing....

headline.main: Finmeccanica Settles With Italy Prosecutors to End Indian Chopper Deal Probe
headline.print_headline: Finmeccanica Settles With Italy Prosecutors to End Indian Chopper Deal Probe

docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's Finmeccanica said on Tuesday it had reached a agreement with prosecutors to settle legal proceedings over a high profile helicopter contract between one of its units and India, adding this did not equal an acknowledgment of any wrongdoing.

docs.snippet: Maryland authorities said Tuesday they will charge a man with disorderly conduct in a cemetery for allegedly urinating on the grave of former Baltimore Ravens owner Art Modell....

headline.main: Man Facing Charges for Urinating on Modell's Grave
headline.print_headline: Man Facing Charges for Urinating on Modell's Grave

docs.lead_paragraph: Maryland authorities said Tuesday they will charge a man with disorderly conduct in a cemetery for allegedly urinating on the grave of former Baltimore Ravens owner Art Modell.

docs.snippet: A federal judge who struck down the District of Columbia's ban on carrying handguns outside the home has stopped his ruling from going into effect for about three months so city lawmakers can respond with new legislation....

headline.main: Judge Delays His Ruling Against DC Handgun Ban
headline.print_headline: Judge Delays His Ruling Against DC Handgun Ban

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge who struck down the District of Columbia's ban on carrying handguns outside the home has stopped his ruling from going into effect for about three months so city lawmakers can respond with new legislation.

docs.snippet: The U.S. judge overseeing a criminal drug prosecution against FedEx Corp said one of the core issues will be what FedEx executives knew about illegal online pharmacies whose packages it shipped....

headline.main: What FedEx Knew of Online Pharmacies Is Key Issue in Drug Case: Judge
headline.print_headline: What FedEx Knew of Online Pharmacies Is Key Issue in Drug Case: Judge

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. judge overseeing a criminal drug prosecution against FedEx Corp said one of the core issues will be what FedEx executives knew about illegal online pharmacies whose packages it shipped.

docs.snippet: A new television series starring Anne Heche and Jason Isaacs is moving some of its production from Israel to New Mexico....

headline.main: TV Series Moving Some Production to New Mexico
headline.print_headline: TV Series Moving Some Production to New Mexico

docs.lead_paragraph: A new television series starring Anne Heche and Jason Isaacs is moving some of its production from Israel to New Mexico.

docs.snippet: A bill that seeks to punish Venezuelan officials accused of human rights abuses has surmounted another hurdle in the Senate....

headline.main: Bill to Sanction Venezuela Takes Step Forward
headline.print_headline: Bill to Sanction Venezuela Takes Step Forward

docs.lead_paragraph: A bill that seeks to punish Venezuelan officials accused of human rights abuses has surmounted another hurdle in the Senate.
